title: Sync hangs
body:
# üêû Bug Report ### Description Lot of `beacon node doesn't have a parent in db with root` error in log and syncing loops from a specific block. I run just the prysm without pow node. ## üî• Error 

time="2022-09-15 14:42:32" level=info msg="Node started p2p server" multiAddr="/ip4/88.151.101.14/tcp/13000/p2p/16Uiu2HAmRcCDxvWRSr79HmyfeMUdcb6NP7E33QWMP1eGPRN85qV1" prefix=p2p
time="2022-09-15 14:42:37" level=info msg="Waiting for enough suitable peers before syncing" prefix=initial-sync required=3 suitable=2
time="2022-09-15 14:42:47" level=info msg="Processing block batch of size 31 starting from  0x4f139844... 4700033/4701812 - estimated time remaining 19m7s" blocksPerSecond=1.6 peers=6 prefix=initial-sync
time="2022-09-15 14:43:32" level=info msg="Peer summary" activePeers=40 inbound=20 outbound=20 prefix=p2p
time="2022-09-15 14:44:03" level=warning msg="Skip processing batched blocks" error="could not process block in batch: got an unexpected error in JSON-RPC response: Post "http://localhost:8551": dial tcp 127.0.0.1:8551: connect: connection refused: received an undefined ee error" prefix=initial-sync
time="2022-09-15 14:44:03" level=info msg="Processing block batch of size 62 starting from  0xd7306074... 4700064/4701818 - estimated time remaining 9m25s" blocksPerSecond=3.1 peers=46 prefix=initial-sync
time="2022-09-15 14:44:20" level=warning msg="Skip processing batched blocks" error="could not process block in batch: got an unexpected error in JSON-RPC response: Post "http://localhost:8551": dial tcp 127.0.0.1:8551: connect: connection refused: received an undefined ee error" prefix=initial-sync
time="2022-09-15 14:44:20" level=info msg="Processing block batch of size 63 starting from  0xa13adea6... 4700128/4701819 - estimated time remaining 4m30s" blocksPerSecond=6.2 peers=53 prefix=initial-sync
time="2022-09-15 14:44:20" level=warning msg="Skip processing batched blocks" error="beacon node doesn't have a parent in db with root: 0xce3a5bc37852aaf4c0ba29165c239f9a6b574bbf3ec90b1d0ba18d1e85b017bb (in processBatchedBlocks, slot=4700128)" prefix=initial-sync
time="2022-09-15 14:44:20" level=info msg="Processing block batch of size 63 starting from  0x34ffdfa7... 4700192/4701819 - estimated time remaining 2m53s" blocksPerSecond=9.4 peers=53 prefix=initial-sync
time="2022-09-15 14:44:20" level=warning msg="Skip processing batched blocks" error="beacon node doesn't have a parent in db with root: 0x8de66df20324abd175a108d977a7d02ec914d9bbb8fa36081ac92833d38a15aa (in processBatchedBlocks, slot=4700192)" prefix=initial-sync
time="2022-09-15 14:44:20" level=info msg="Processing block batch of size 64 starting from  0x5e5065d9... 4700256/4701819 - estimated time remaining 2m4s" blocksPerSecond=12.6 peers=53 prefix=initial-sync
time="2022-09-15 14:44:20" level=warning msg="Skip processing batched blocks" error="beacon node doesn't have a parent in db with root: 0xb7066b01ebe292b152acc9a5cdf7983164bbc13e74f098a7613d1c6c87032e59 (in processBatchedBlocks, slot=4700256)" prefix=initial-sync
time="2022-09-15 14:44:20" level=info msg="Processing block batch of size 64 starting from  0x293abd24... 4700320/4701819 - estimated time remaining 1m34s" blocksPerSecond=15.8 peers=53 prefix=initial-sync
time="2022-09-15 14:44:20" level=warning msg="Skip processing batched blocks" error="beacon node doesn't have a parent in db with root: 0xf0bd94756c9bf5cdfb913a35b1749c4c177078e097895f8b8ff1f14d2032d871 (in processBatchedBlocks, slot=4700320)" prefix=initial-sync
time="2022-09-15 14:44:20" level=info msg="Processing block batch of size 64 starting from  0x55e96f70... 4700384/4701819 - estimated time remaining 1m15s" blocksPerSecond=19.0 peers=53 prefix=initial-sync
time="2022-09-15 14:44:20" level=warning msg="Skip processing batched blocks" error="beacon node doesn't have a parent in db with root: 0xdbdbf6c6fdb98558aa31a90b801f9220827c726a53952ab02c000bc9c55be525 (in processBatchedBlocks, slot=4700384)" prefix=initial-sync
time="2022-09-15 14:44:20" level=info msg="Processing block batch of size 60 starting from  0x33393735... 4700448/4701819 - estimated time remaining 1m2s" blocksPerSecond=22.0 peers=53 prefix=initial-sync
time="2022-09-15 14:44:20" level=warning msg="Skip processing batched blocks" error="beacon node doesn't have a parent in db with root: 0x6a1ba11c757ef6fc38a6bc16d40f5e50cb966a257d3f053152af818c7658ea08 (in processBatchedBlocks, slot=4700448)" prefix=initial-sync
time="2022-09-15 14:44:24" level=info msg="Processing block batch of size 63 starting from  0x4f139844... 4700033/4701820 - estimated time remaining 1m21s" blocksPerSecond=22.1 peers=53 prefix=initial-sync
time="2022-09-15 14:44:32" level=info msg="Peer summary" activePeers=50 inbound=40 outbound=10 prefix=p2p
## üåç Your Environment **Operating System:** 
  
Debian 11 amd64
**What version of Prysm are you running? (Which release)** 
  
beacon-chain version Prysm/v3.1.1/653ea3b030c3bb99aa3f3d95a8de9f4d6e147930. Built at: 2022-09-09 17:21:54+00:00

> I run just the prysm without pow node

Do you mean you did not run an execution client such as Geth or Nethermind? In that case it is the problem. You *need* it for Prysm to work correctly.

> > I run just the prysm without pow node > > Do you mean you did not run an execution client such as Geth or Nethermind? In that case it is the problem. You _need_ it for Prysm to work correctly. geth is running as well but looses connection with prysm
I decided to delete prysm database and re-sync from scratch the beacon chain.

> I decided to delete prysm database and re-sync from scratch the beacon chain.

Following up on this issue, got stuck on the same location as before, having synced the beacon chain from scratch again.

```
block in batch: could not reconstruct parent state
[2022-09-19 17:06:16]  INFO initial-sync: Processing block batch of size 63 starting from  0x063c579d... 4700096/4731929 - estimated time remaining 4m57s blocksPerSecond=107.1 peers=43
[2022-09-19 17:06:16]  WARN initial-sync: Skip processing batched blocks error=beacon node doesn't have a parent in db with root: 0x91593f4ce1da4260a4475807af54ada66481b2e5529859fbcdd636c59966ac5d (in processBatchedBlocks, slot=4700096)
[2022-09-19 17:06:16]  INFO initial-sync: Processing block batch of size 62 starting from  0xe5a59df5... 4700160/4731929 - estimated time remaining 4m48s blocksPerSecond=110.2 peers=44
[2022-09-19 17:06:16]  WARN initial-sync: Skip processing batched blocks error=beacon node doesn't have a parent in db with root: 0x099ce628bdb98cd34673e06f779a695a9fa903472f95f778a823c4b271296669 (in processBatchedBlocks, slot=4700160)
[2022-09-19 17:06:16]  INFO initial-sync: Processing block batch of size 64 starting from  0xf0b0a565... 4700224/4731929 - estimated time remaining 4m39s blocksPerSecond=113.4 peers=45
[2022-09-19 17:06:16]  WARN initial-sync: Skip processing batched blocks error=beacon node doesn't have a parent in db with root: 0x6a644e5ce7eb9063ac0334eb070469ffe1babef71b42fc295a0098410c8509ff (in processBatchedBlocks, slot=4700224)
[2022-09-19 17:06:16]  INFO initial-sync: Processing block batch of size 64 starting from  0x4aef416e... 4700288/4731929 - estimated time remaining 4m31s blocksPerSecond=116.6 peers=45
[2022-09-19 17:06:16]  WARN initial-sync: Skip processing batched blocks error=beacon node doesn't have a parent in db with root: 0xa165b5186776ed6adbeffbe7f9861a25cfe9e9a79b79fbf63c44f0f3f0fd2433 (in processBatchedBlocks, slot=4700288)
[2022-09-19 17:06:18]  INFO initial-sync: Processing block batch of size 64 starting from  0xe2ad65e3... 4700352/4731929 - estimated time remaining 4m23s blocksPerSecond=119.8 peers=45
[2022-09-19 17:06:18]  WARN initial-sync: Skip processing batched blocks error=beacon node doesn't have a parent in db with root: 0x0d5b8ab2983591a9dd27b6b6b99540f75de7a6b7f88dfe6dd83ac5e8316b0d79 (in processBatchedBlocks, slot=4700352)
[2022-09-19 17:06:18]  INFO initial-sync: Processing block batch of size 63 starting from  0xe08fde61... 4700416/4731929 - estimated time remaining 4m16s blocksPerSecond=123.0 peers=45
[2022-09-19 17:06:18]  WARN initial-sync: Skip processing batched blocks error=beacon node doesn't have a parent in db with root: 0xb493b115a9e7dadff196d1fd9092c477b3503a148983a6cd37111a00ba526862 (in processBatchedBlocks, slot=4700416)
[2022-09-19 17:06:18]  INFO initial-sync: Processing block batch of size 61 starting from  0x86a688c4... 4700480/4731929 - estimated time remaining 4m9s blocksPerSecond=126.0 peers=45
[2022-09-19 17:06:18]  WARN initial-sync: Skip processing batched blocks error=beacon node doesn't have a parent in db with root: 0x027754e93bb1598df359a43c47c11affd9e03bac62bdefe91e3ee09e8ba1734e (in processBatchedBlocks, slot=4700480)
```
```

{
  "data": {
    "head_slot": "4700031",
    "sync_distance": "31859",
    "is_syncing": true,
    "is_optimistic": true
  }
}
```

This time stuck at `head_slot` 4700031
It seems you did not have synced any block from POS to execution layer? DO you have connection to it?

> It seems you did not have synced any block from POS to execution layer? DO you have connection to it?

I do, but geth looses connection with prysm after a few minutes.

Basically, when prysm is on the "state" of showing the logs `beacon node doesn't have a parent in db with root`, geth is unable to connect to it

`WARN [09-19|17:50:17.305] Post-merge network, but no beacon client seen. Please launch one to follow the chain!`

If I restart prysm, geth is able to connect:
`WARN [09-19|17:52:32.317] Beacon client online, but no consensus updates received in a while. Please fix your beacon client to follow the chain!
`

but after a few minutes I get this:
```
WARN [09-19|17:27:39.045] Snapshot extension registration failed   peer=ba83bd0f err="peer connected on snap without compatible eth support"
WARN [09-19|17:29:25.246] Previously seen beacon client is offline. Please ensure it is operational to follow the chain! 
```
Which version of prysm do use?
What happens when you wait half-one hour? When the issue is still available, please open a new issue about this.

> What happens when you wait half-one hour? When the issue is still available, please open a new issue about this.

Remains stuck as before. Left it overnight already.

Already opened a new ticket, https://github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/issues/11471
